bibl.title: The Epistle of Jude: Its Text and Transmission
bibl.note: The two earliest papyrus witnesses to Jude, P72 and P78 (ca. 300 C.E.), are studied in detail. For the first time, plates of these early papyri are published with complete transcriptions.
bibl.seg: Tommy Wasserman, The Epistle of Jude: Its Text and Transmission = Coniectanea Biblica. New Testament Series. 43.
Stockholm, Almqvist & Wiksell, 2006, 8Â°, 369 pp. et 16 pll. ISBN 978-91-22-02159-9.
The two earliest papyrus witnesses to Jude, P72 and P78 (ca. 300 C.E.), are studied in detail. For the first time, plates of these early papyri are published with complete transcriptions.
